page.title: 19 LOCAL HISTORY
page.content: LIFE FIFTY YEARS AGO MY DAY WOULD START AROUND 8.30.I WOULD SHARE THE BED WITH MY BROTHERS AND SISTERS.I WOULD PUT MY CLOTHES ON WHICH WERE LONG DRESSES,A PAIR OF BUTTON UP BOOTS AND A PAIR OF LONG SOCKS.I WOULD GET WASHED IN A BIG TUB AS WE DID NOT HAVE A BATH WITH RUNNING WATER.FOR BREAKFAST WE WOULD HAVE PORRIDGE.AFTER BREAKFAST WE WOULD LEAVE OUR MINERS COTTAGES TO GO TO SCHOOL.SCHOOL STARTED AT 9.00 WITH A PRAYER AND RELIGIOUS KNOWLEDGE.THEN WE WOULD DO MENTAL ARITHMETIC.AT LUNCH TIME SOME PEOPLE WENT HOME WHILE OTHERS WOULD BRING A PACKED LUNCH WHICH WOULD BE FRUIT,BREAD AND CHEESE. AFTER LUNCH WE HAD 15 MINUTES TO PLAY. WE USUALLY PLAY BOOLS.SCHOOL FINISHED AT 4.00.AT HOME THE TABLES AND CHAIRS WERE MADE FROM OLD FRUIT BOXES.MEALS WERE COOKED OVER AN OPEN FIRE.
